item.title: In Russia Airfield Attacks, Ukraine Aims for Strategic and Symbolic Blow
item.description: While the full extent of the damage is still unknown, the operation shows how Kyiv has been able to adapt and evolve over the war using drones.

item.title: What to Know About the Russia-Ukraine Cease-Fire Talks
item.description: The two sides met on Monday in Istanbul, but expectations for a breakthrough were low.

item.title: Attack in Boulder, Colorado, Investigated as Act of Terrorism: What to Know

item.title: Companies Rely on Delaware Courts. Lawyers Reap Huge Fees There.
item.description: A new study found that courts in the state, where many big companies reside, often cleared big payouts to lawyers. It may further embolden the state’s...

item.title: Poland’s Presidential Election Result Highlights Trump-Europe Divide
item.description: The country’s government is centrist, with deep ties to Brussels. Its new president is a Trump-backed nationalist. That reflects a broader struggle.
